amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to innovation in higher education.

vote.text: Amendment SA 792 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 792 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Bennet. (consideration: CR 3/26/2015 S2014-2022; text: CR 3/26/2015 S2020-2021) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to innovation in higher education.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 792 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 792 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Bennet.
